column5: My husband and I have been hosting guests around the world since 2007. We enjoy meeting people. We live in a very quiet neighborhood. our goal is to make sure our guests feel comfortable at home. The room is very cozy with desk and closet. The location is unbeatable, Convenient to Hwy. 290, Hwy. 183 and SH-130. Close to major employers like Samsung, Dell and Applied Materials. Only 10 miles to the University of Texas, 20 min to downtown and to the airport.
column8: Stylish room close to IT Dist Dell, Samsung, Apple
